text:
The IntrospectionHelperTest#setTen(File) method assumes every non-Unix and non-
Netware system uses a Windows-like file notation with a colon (':') as the 
second character in the absolute path.  Java under OpenVMS internally works 
with Unix-style paths.

The attached patch fixes this.  (To commiter: Check that I've updated the 
copyright year correctly.)
creator: knut@paranor.ch
knut@paranor.ch
text:
Created attachment 7938
makes IntrospectionHelperTest OpenVMS aware
